Bento Box

This index.html page contains all the ui element that will used in the superseede project. It is based on the Skeleton CSS boilerplate. Using the typographic sizes and the 960 grid. But with aded components for images, navbar, flexbox grids and theming. If you need some help hit up the Skeleton documentation.

Download It Fork It

Card

The card component is used to get a closer look at a post. Otherwise you the post image component. The card component is the only component that shows a post description.

user name

hipster love their cold brew

Buttons

Buttons come in two basic flavors in Bento. The standard .button element is plain, whereas the .button-primary button is vibrant and has a drop shadow on hover

Anchor button
Anchor button

List

In bento you have three different list options. With the final option .noStyle has no list-style.

Tables

Tables need to by properly formated with thead and tbody.

Pokemon Level Type
Bulbsaur 5 Grass
Charamder 5 Fire
Squirtle 5 Water

Post Images

These simple flexbox items will wrap to form grids base of the document size. On hover the image lifts off the page to give the user feed back Both the image and user name are links that will take you to different places.

User Name

User Name

User Name

Avatar Images

These circles images shape also helps them distinguished users from posts. Unlike the post image element the whole avatar image section is a giant link. Their show only be one row of six at anytime on the main feeds.
